a-jig-so-puzzled.name: A Jig So Puzzled
a-jig-so-puzzled.author: Nicolas “Niols” Jeannerod
a-jig-so-puzzled.content:
\relative f' <<
  \new Voice {
    \clef treble
    \key d \major
    \time 6/8

    \repeat volta 2 {
      \partial 8 a8 |
      fis4 d8 fis4 a8 |
      d8 cis b a4 a8 |
      b8 g b a g fis |
      e4. a4
      \bar "|" \break

      a8 |
      fis4 d8 fis4 a8 |
      d8 cis b a4 a8 |
      b8 g b a g fis |
      e4. d4
    } \break

    e8 |
    fis4 d8 fis4 fis8 |
    g8 fis e fis4 fis8 |
    g8 fis e fis e d |
    cis a cis e4
    \bar "|" \break

    e8 |
    fis4 d8 fis4 fis8 |
    g8 fis e fis4 fis8 |
    g8 fis e fis e d |
    cis4. b4
    \bar "||" \break

    e8 |
    fis4 d8 fis4 fis8 |
    g8 fis e fis4 fis8 |
    g8 fis e fis e d |
    cis a cis e4
    \bar "|" \break

    e8 |
    fis4 d8 fis4 a8 |
    d8 cis b a4 a8 |
    b8 g b a g fis |
    e4. d4
    \bar "|."
  }

  \new ChordNames {
    \chordmode {
      s8 |
      d4. d/cis | b:m a | g d/fis | e:7 a:7 |
      d4. d/cis | b:m a | g d/fis | a:7 d |

      b2.:m | e4.:m b:m | e:m b:m | a a:7 |
      b2.:m | e4.:m b:m | e:m b:m | a:7 b:m |

      b2.:m | e4.:m b:m | e:m b:m | a a:7 |
      d4. d/cis | b:m a | g d/fis | a:7 d4
    }
  }
>>

a-plane-from-reykjavik.name: A Plane from Reykjavík
a-plane-from-reykjavik.author: Nicolas “Niols” Jeannerod
a-plane-from-reykjavik.content:
\relative f' <<
  \new Voice {
    \clef treble
    \key g \minor
    \time 4/4

    \repeat volta 2 {
      g4 d8. g16 bes,8. g'16 a,8. g'16 |
      g,4 \tuplet 3/2 { g'8 a bes } c4 \tuplet 3/2 { bes8 a f } |
      g4 d8. g16 bes,8. g'16 a,8. g'16 |
      \tuplet 3/2 { c,4 d ees } \tuplet 3/2 { d8 c bes } \tuplet 3/2 { c8 bes a } |
      \break

      g'4 d8. g16 bes,8. g'16 a,8. g'16 |
      g,4 \tuplet 3/2 { g'8 a bes } c4 \tuplet 3/2 { bes8 a f } |
      g4 d8. g16 bes,8. g'16 a,8. g'16 |
      \tuplet 3/2 { c,4 d ees } \tuplet 3/2 { fis4 g a } |
      \bar "||" \break

      bes4 f8. bes16 d8. bes16 f'8. f,16 |
      c'16 d ees8 d16 c bes8 a16 bes c8 f,4 |
      bes4 f8. bes16 d8. bes16 f'8. f,16 |
      c'16 d ees8 g4 f16 g a8 c4 |
      \break

      bes8. f16 \tuplet 3/2 { d8 ees f } g8. ees16 \tuplet 3/2 { c8 d ees } |
      f8. c16 \tuplet 3/2 { a8 bes c } f,4 a8. c16 |
      bes8. f16 \tuplet 3/2 { d8 ees f } g8. ees16 \tuplet 3/2 { c8 d ees } |
      f8. c16 \tuplet 3/2 { a8 bes c } bes4 bes |
    }
  }

  \new ChordNames {
    \chordmode {
      g1:m | g2:m f | g1:m | c2:m d4 d:7/fis |
      g1:m | g2:m f | g1:m | c2:m d:7 |

      bes1 | c2:m f4 f:7 | bes1 | c2:m f |
      bes2 c:m | f f:7 | bes c:m | f:7 bes |
    }
  }
>>

and-guess-what.name: ...and Guess What?
and-guess-what.author: Nicolas “Niols” Jeannerod
and-guess-what.content:
\relative f' <<
  \new Voice {
    \clef treble
    \time 4/4
    \key a \major

    \repeat volta 2 {
      cis4 d16 e8. fis e16 fis a8. |
      gis8. fis16 e gis8. a4. b8 |
      cis8. d16 e cis8. b a16 gis fis8. |
      e8. d16 cis b8. a2 |
      \break

      cis4 d16 e8. fis e16 fis a8. |
      gis8. fis16 e gis8. a4. cis8 |
      \tuplet 3/2 { d8 e fis } \tuplet 3/2 { e8 d cis } \tuplet 3/2 { d8 cis b } a8. d16 |
      \tuplet 3/2 { cis8 b a } \tuplet 3/2 { gis8 a b } cis16 a8. a8
      \bar "||" \break

      e'8 |
      a16 e8. e e16 gis e8. e e16 |
      fis16 d8. d fis16 e4. e8 |
      fis16 d8. d fis16 e4 e8 cis |
      d8. cis16 b a8. b4. e8 |
      \break

      a16 e8. e e16 gis e8. e e16 |
      fis16 d8. d fis16 e4. cis8 |
      \tuplet 3/2 { d8 e fis } \tuplet 3/2 { e8 d cis } \tuplet 3/2 { d8 cis b } a8. d16 |
      \tuplet 3/2 { cis8 b a } \tuplet 3/2 { gis8 a b } cis16 a8. a4
    }
  }

  \new ChordNames {
    \chordmode {
      a2 d | e a | a e | e:7 a |
      a2 d | e a | d4 a/cis b:m a | a e:7 a4.

      s8 |
      a2 e | d a | b:m a | d e:7 |
      a2 e | d a | d4 a/cis b:m a | a e:7 a2 |
    }
  }
>>

I wrote this tune during the RSCDS Summer School 2023. I was playing for
Debbie Roxburgh and wanted a tune to match her specific 48-bars warm-up, and
here it is!

donaldson-s-rant.name: Donaldson's Rant
donaldson-s-rant.author: Saskia Frisby
donaldson-s-rant.content:
<<
  \relative c'' {
    \clef treble
    \key c \major
    \time 6/8

    \repeat volta 2 {
      \partial 8 g8 |
      c,4 e8 g4 c,8 |
      f g a g4 c8 |
      g e c a' g f |
      e d c d4. |
      \break

      e4 a8 g4 c8 |
      e d c b4. |
      c8 b a g a g |
      f e d c4
    } \break

    \repeat volta 2 {
      a'8 |
      g b d e c a |
      g b d g e c |
      f d b e c a |
      b c a g4 g8 |
      \break

      c,4 g'8 f4 a8 |
      g4 b8 c4 e8 |
      c a d b g c |
      c d b c4.
    } \break

    g8 a b c4. |
    f,8 e d c4. |
    c'8 b e g,4. |
    f8 e g d4 g8 |
    \break

    c,4 e8 g4 c,8 |
    f g a g4 e'8 |
    g,4 c8 e,4 g8 |
    f e d c4
    \bar "|."
  }

  \chords {
    s8 |
    c2. | f4. c | c f | c g |
    a4.:m c | c g | c g | g c4

    s8 |
    g4. c | g c | b:dim c | g g |
    c4. f | g c | f g | c4 g8 c4. |

    g4. c | f c | c g | f g |
    c2. | f4. c | g c | g c4
  }
>>

emmy-s-wedding-40bars.name: Emmy's Wedding (40-bar Version)
emmy-s-wedding-40bars.author: Nicolas “Niols” Jeannerod
emmy-s-wedding-40bars.content:
\relative f' <<
  \new Voice {
    \clef treble
    \time 4/4
    \key f \major

    \partial 2 f8 g a bes |
    \repeat volta 2 {
      c4 a8 f bes4 g8 e |
      f8 e f a c,4 c |
      bes'8 a bes d g, a bes d |
      c8 b c e g,4 a8 bes |
      \break

      c4 a8 f bes4 g8 e |
      f8 e f a c,4 c |
      bes'8 a bes d c b c e |
      f,4 f f8 c' d e |
      \break \bar "||"

      f8 c a' c, g' c, e c |
      d8 a f' a, e' a, c a |
      bes8 d c bes a g f e |
      e8 f g e bes'4 a8 g |
      \break

      f'8 c a' c, g' c, e c |
      d8 a f' a, e' a, c a |
      bes8 d c bes a g f e |
    } \alternative { {
      f4 f f8 g a bes |
    } {
      f4 f f8 c' d e |
    } }
    \bar "||" \break

    f8 c a' c, g' c, e c |
    d8 a f' a, e' a, c a |
    bes8 d c bes a g f e |
    e8 f g e bes'4 a8 g |
    \break

    f'8 c a' c, g' c, e c |
    d8 a f' a, e' a, c a |
    bes8 d c bes a g f e |
    f4 f f
    \bar "|."
  }

  \new ChordNames {
    \chordmode {
      s2 |
      f2 c:7 | f1 | bes2 g:m | c c:7 |
      f2 c:7 | f1 | bes2 c:7 | f c:7 |

      f2 c:7 | d:m a:m | g:m f | e:dim c:7 |
      f2 c:7 | d:m a:m | bes c:7 | f c:7 | f c:7 |

      f2 c:7 | d:m a:m | g:m f | e:dim c:7 |
      f2 c:7 | d:m a:m | bes c:7 | f f4
    }
  }
>>
emmy-s-wedding-40bars.composer-details:
I initially wrote “Matt's Wedding” as a wedding march-like strathspey for both
Emmy and Matt, and “Emmy's Wedding” as the companion reel for their medley
dance. At that point, the tunes were both named “Emmy and Matt's Wedding”.
Emmy and Matt later decided to refer to the strathspey and reel parts of the
medley as standalone dances and that is how the tunes got their independant
names.

emmy-s-wedding.name: Emmy's Wedding
emmy-s-wedding.author: Nicolas “Niols” Jeannerod
emmy-s-wedding.content:
\relative f' <<
  \new Voice {
    \clef treble
    \time 4/4
    \key f \major

    \partial 2 f8 g a bes |
    \repeat volta 2 {
      c4 a8 f bes4 g8 e |
      f8 e f a c,4 c |
      bes'8 a bes d g, a bes d |
      c8 b c e g,4 a8 bes |
      \break

      c4 a8 f bes4 g8 e |
      f8 e f a c,4 c |
      bes'8 a bes d c b c e |
      f,4 f f8 c' d e |
      \break \bar "||"

      f8 c a' c, g' c, e c |
      d8 a f' a, e' a, c a |
      bes8 d c bes a g f e |
      e8 f g e bes'4 a8 g |
      \break

      f'8 c a' c, g' c, e c |
      d8 a f' a, e' a, c a |
      bes8 d c bes a g f e |
    } \alternative { {
      f4 f f8 g a bes |
    } {
      f4 f f
    } } \bar "|."
  }

  \new ChordNames {
    \chordmode {
      s2 |
      f2 c:7 | f1 | bes2 g:m | c c:7 |
      f2 c:7 | f1 | bes2 c:7 | f c:7 |

      f2 c:7 | d:m a:m | g:m f | e:dim c:7 |
      f2 c:7 | d:m a:m | bes c:7 | f c:7 | f f4
    }
  }
>>
emmy-s-wedding.composer-details:
I initially wrote “Matt's Wedding” as a wedding march-like strathspey for both
Emmy and Matt, and “Emmy's Wedding” as the companion reel for their medley
dance. At that point, the tunes were both named “Emmy and Matt's Wedding”.
Emmy and Matt later decided to refer to the strathspey and reel parts of the
medley as standalone dances and that is how the tunes got their independant

en-marchant-pour-aller-photocopier-des-t.name: En marchant pour aller photocopier des trucs
en-marchant-pour-aller-photocopier-des-t.author: Nicolas “Niols” Jeannerod
en-marchant-pour-aller-photocopier-des-t.composer-details:
I wrote this tune during Summer School 2019. It was an assignment given by Ian
Muir as part of the course for class musicians. The week was very busy and the
only time I found to compose the tune while I was on my way to the centre of
St. Andrews to go print music sets.
en-marchant-pour-aller-photocopier-des-t.content:
\transpose a, d {
  \relative g' <<
    {
      \clef treble
      \key a \major
      \time 6/8

      \repeat volta 2 {
        \partial 8 b8 |
        cis8 a a a a gis |
        fis d d d d cis |
        b d fis gis fis e |
        e fis gis a b cis |
        \break

        cis a a a a gis |
        fis d d d d cis |
        b d fis e gis b |
        a4. a4
      } \break

      gis8 |
      fis cis cis cis b cis |
      fis d d d cis d |
      e b b b a b |
      cis d e fis gis a |
      \break

      fis cis cis cis b cis |
      fis d d d cis d |
      e b b b a gis |
      fis4. fis4 fis8 |
      \bar "||" \break

      fis' cis cis cis b cis |
      fis d d d cis d |
      e b b b a b |
      cis d e fis4 d'8 |
      \break

      cis a a a a gis fis d d d d cis |
      b d fis e gis b |
      a4. a4
      \bar "|."
    }

    \new ChordNames {
      \chordmode {
        s8 |
        a2. | d | b:m | e:7 |
        a2. | d | b4.:m e:7 | a2. |

        fis2.:m/cis | d | e | cis4.:m fis:m |
        fis2.:m/cis | d | e | fis:m |

        fis2.:m/cis | d | e | cis4.:m d/fis |
        a2. | d | b4.:m e:7 | a4. s4
      }
    }
  >>
}

flying-across-the-river.name: Flying Across the River
flying-across-the-river.author: Nicolas “Niols” Jeannerod
flying-across-the-river.content:
\relative f' <<
  {
    \clef treble
    \key e \minor
    \time 6/8

    \repeat volta 2 {
      \partial 8 fis8 |
      g fis e b4 b8 |
      c d e fis4 fis8 |
      g fis e b' g d |
      c d e fis4 fis8 |
      \break

      g fis e b4 b8 |
      c d e fis4 fis8 |
      g fis e d e fis |
      e4. e4
    } \break

    \repeat volta 2 {
      d8 |
      d g b c b a |
      g fis e d4 fis8 |
      e g b e d c |
      b a g fis4 fis8 |
      \break

      g fis e fis e d |
      e fis g d4 d8 |
      e fis g fis e d |
      e4. e4
    }
  }

  \new ChordNames {
    \chordmode {
      s8 |
      e2.:m | c4. d | e:m g/d | c b:7 |
      e2.:m | c4. d | e:m d | e2.:m |

      g4. a:m | c d | e:m a:m/e | e:m b:7/dis |
      e4.:m d | c g/b | c d | e:m s4
    }
  }
>>

forty-bars-of-clouds.name: Forty Bars of Clouds
forty-bars-of-clouds.author: Nicolas “Niols” Jeannerod
forty-bars-of-clouds.content:
\relative f' <<
  {
    \clef treble
    \key c \major
    \time 4/4

    c'4 c8 d e g,4 g8 |
    c b c d e d c b |
    d4 d8 e f a,4 a8 |
    d cis d e f e d c |
    \break

    c4 c8 d e g,4 g8 |
    c b c d e d c b |
    f'4 d8 f e4 c8 e |
    d4 b8 d c4 c |
    \bar "||" \break

    c8 b c d e g,4 g8 |
    c b c d e d c b |
    d cis d e f a,4 a8 |
    d cis d e f e d c |
    \break

    c b c d e g,4 g8 |
    c b c d e d c b |
    f'8 d a f' e c g e' |
    d b g d' c4 c |
    \bar "||" \break

    a'8 gis a b c e,4 e8 |
    a gis a b c b a g |
    g fis g a b d,4 d8 |
    g fis g a b a g f |
    \break

    f e f g a c,4 c8 |
    f e f g a g f e |
    gis e gis a b e,4 e8 |
    gis e gis a b a gis e |
    \bar "||" \break

    a8 gis a b c e,4 e8 |
    a gis a b c b a g |
    g fis g a b d,4 d8 |
    g fis g a b a g f |
    \break

    f e f g a c,4 c8 |
    f e f g a g f e |
    \tuplet 3/4 { b4 c8 } \tuplet 3/4 { d4 c8 } |
    \tuplet 3/4 { b4 c8 } b2 |
    \bar "||" \break

    c4 c8 d e g,4 g8 |
    c b c d e d c b |
    d cis d e f a,4 a8 |
    d cis d e f e d c |
    \break

    c b c d e g,4 g8 |
    c b c d e d c b |
    f' d a f' e c g e' |
    d b g d' c4 c |
    \bar "|."
  }

  \new ChordNames {
    \chordmode {
      c1 | s | d:m | s | c | s | d2:m c | g c |
      c1 | s | d:m | s | c | s | d2:m c | g c |
      a1:m | s | g | s | f | s | e | s |
      a1:m | s | g | s | f | s | e | s |
      c1 | s | d:m | s | c | s | d2:m c | g c |
    }
  }
>>

hello-goodb.content:
\relative f'' <<
  {
    \clef treble
    \key d \major
    \time 4/4

    \repeat volta 2 {
      \partial 4 d8 cis |
      d4 cis8 d e4 fis8 g |
      fis4 e d d8 cis |
      b8 cis d b cis d e cis |
      a2 a4 d8 cis |
      d4 cis8 d e4 cis |
      d2 d4
    } \break

    d8 cis |
    b4 fis8 b b4 fis8 b |
    b4 g8 b b4 g8 b |
    cis4 a8 cis cis4 a8 cis |
    cis4 ais8 cis cis4 ais8 cis |
    d4 b8 d d4 b8 d |
    e2.
    \bar "||" \break

    d8 cis |
    b4 fis8 b b4 fis8 b |
    b4 g8 b b4 g8 b |
    cis4 a8 cis cis4 a8 cis |
    cis4 ais8 cis cis4 ais8 cis |
    d4 cis8 d e4 cis |
    d2 d4
    \bar "|."
  }

  \new ChordNames {
    \chordmode {
      a4:7 |
      d2 a | d1 | g2 a | d a | d a:7 | d2.

      fis4:7 |
      b1:m | g | a | fis | b:m | a2.:7

      fis4:7 |
      b1:m | g | a | fis | d2 a:7 | d2.
    }
  }
>>

love-is-in-the-air-48-bars.name: Love is in the Air
love-is-in-the-air-48-bars.author: Nicolas “Niols” Jeannerod
love-is-in-the-air-48-bars.content:
\relative f' <<
  \new Voice {
    \clef treble
    \time 4/4
    \key d \major

    \repeat volta 3 {
      \partial 4 a4 |
      d,4 fis8 a b4 a |
      b8 a b cis d4 d8 cis |
      b4 d8 fis b a g fis |
      e d cis b a g fis e |
      \break

      d4 fis8 a b4 a |
      b8 a b cis d4 d8 cis |
      b4 d8 fis b a g fis |
      e d e fis d4
      \bar "||" \break

      d8 e |
      fis4 a8 fis g fis e g |
      fis d b cis d cis b a |
      g a b cis d cis b a |
      a b cis d e fis g a |
      \break

      fis4 a8 fis g fis e g |
      fis d b cis d cis b a |
      g a b cis a b cis e |
      fis4 d d
    }
  }

  \new ChordNames {
    \chordmode {
      s4 |
      d2 g | a d | b:m e:m | a2 a:7 |
      d2 g | a d | b:m e:m | a2:7 d4

      s4 |
      d2 e:m | b1:m | g | a2 a:7 |
      d2 e:m | b1:m | g2 a:7 | d2.
    }
  }
>>

love-is-in-the-air.name: Love is in the Air (32-bar Version)
love-is-in-the-air.author: Nicolas “Niols” Jeannerod
love-is-in-the-air.content:
\relative f' <<
  \new Voice {
    \clef treble
    \time 4/4
    \key d \major

    \repeat volta 2 {
      \partial 4 a4 |
      d,4 fis8 a b4 a |
      b8 a b cis d4 d8 cis |
      b4 d8 fis b a g fis |
      e d cis b a g fis e |
      \break

      d4 fis8 a b4 a |
      b8 a b cis d4 d8 cis |
      b4 d8 fis b a g fis |
      e d e fis d4
    } \break

    \repeat volta 2 {
      d8 e |
      fis4 a8 fis g fis e g |
      fis d b cis d cis b a |
      g a b cis d cis b a |
      a b cis d e fis g a |
      \break

      fis4 a8 fis g fis e g |
      fis d b cis d cis b a |
      g a b cis a b cis e |
      fis4 d d
    }
  }

  \new ChordNames {
    \chordmode {
      s4 |
      d2 g | a d | b:m e:m | a2 a:7 |
      d2 g | a d | b:m e:m | a2:7 d |

      d2 e:m | b1:m | g | a2 a:7 |
      d2 e:m | b1:m | g2 a:7 | d2.
    }
  }
>>
love-is-in-the-air.composer-details:
This is how I initially composed as an AABB 32-bar reel, before I presented it
to Violaine Eysseric who liked it and asked to use it for her dance “Love is
in the Air”. For her dance, I play this tune as ABABAB for 48 bars.

      \break

      e8 cis4 d8 e g fis e |

  \new ChordNames {

      s4 |
      a2 d | a a:7/cis | d a/cis | b:7 e |

      s4 |

matt-s-wedding-40bars.name: Matt's Wedding (40-bar Version)
matt-s-wedding-40bars.author: Nicolas “Niols” Jeannerod
matt-s-wedding-40bars.content:
\relative f' <<
  \new Voice {
    \clef treble
    \time 4/4
    \key f \major

    \repeat volta 2 {
      \partial 4 f4 |
      c4 f8. c16 a'8. c,16 bes' c,8. |
      e8. f16 g e8. bes'4 ~ \tuplet 3/2 { bes8 a g } |
      f8( f') e d c bes a g |
      g8. a16 g a8. g4 ~ g16 f e d |
      \break

      c4 f8. c16 a'8. c,16 bes' c,8. |
      e8. f16 g e8. bes'4 ~ \tuplet 3/2 { bes8 a g } |
      f8( f') e d c bes a g |
      g8. a16 g a8. f2 |
      \break \bar "||"

      f8 f' <a a,>4 <g g,> <e e,> |
      <d d,>4 <f f,> <e e,> <c c,> |
      <bes bes,>8 d c bes a g f e |
      e8. f16 g e8. bes'4 ~ \tuplet 3/2 { bes8 a g }
      \break

      f8 f' <a a,>4 <g g,> <e e,> |
      <d d,>4 <f f,> <e e,> <c c,> |
      <bes bes,>8 d c bes a g f e |
    } \alternative { {
      \set Timing.measureLength = #(ly:make-moment 3/4)
      f4 f f |
    } {
      \set Timing.measureLength = #(ly:make-moment 4/4)
      f4 f f2 |
    } } \bar "||" \break

    f8 f' <a a,>4 <g g,> <e e,> |
    <d d,>4 <f f,> <e e,> <c c,> |
    <bes bes,>8 d c bes a g f e |
    e8. f16 g e8. bes'4 ~ \tuplet 3/2 { bes8 a g }
    \break

    f8 f' <a a,>4 <g g,> <e e,> |
    <d d,>4 <f f,> <e e,> <c c,> |
    <bes bes,>8 d c bes a g f e |
    f4 f f
    \bar "|."
  }

  \new ChordNames {
    \chordmode {
      s4 |
      f1 | c2 c:7 | f1 | c2 c:7 |
      f1 | c2 c:7 | f1 | c2:7 f2 |

      f2 c:7 | d:m a:m | g:m f | e:dim c:7 |
      f2 c:7 | d:m a:m | bes c:7 | f2. | f1 |

      f2 c:7 | d:m a:m | g:m f | e:dim c:7 |
      f2 c:7 | d:m a:m | bes c:7 | f2.
    }
  }
>>
matt-s-wedding-40bars.composer-details:
I initially wrote “Matt's Wedding” as a wedding march-like strathspey for both
Emmy and Matt, and “Emmy's Wedding” as the companion reel for their medley
dance. At that point, the tunes were both named “Emmy and Matt's Wedding”.
Emmy and Matt later decided to refer to the strathspey and reel parts of the
medley as standalone dances and that is how the tunes got their independant
names.

michael-taylor-s-jig.name: Michael Taylor's Jig
michael-taylor-s-jig.author: Mikael Georgii
michael-taylor-s-jig.content:
\relative f' <<
  \new Voice {
    \clef treble
    \time 6/8
    \key bes \major

    \partial 8 f8 |
    d8 bes c d ees e |
    f8 g a bes c d |
    c8 g d' c g d' |
    c4. c8 bes g |
    \break

    a8 f bes a f bes |
    a8 g f ees d c |
    bes8 c d g d g |
    f4. ~ f8 ees c |
    \bar "||" \break

    d8 bes c d ees e |
    f8 g a bes c d |
    c8 g d' c g d' |
    c4. c8 bes g |
    \break

    a8 f bes a f bes |
    a8 g f ees d c |
    bes8 c d c bes a |
    bes4. r8 c bes |
    \break

    \repeat volta 2 {
      a8 f g a bes b |
      c8 b c d c a |
      bes8 c d f d g |
      f8 d ees f g bes |
      \break

      bes8 g bes c g cis |
      d8 bes f d ees f |
      g8 ees g a f a |
    } \alternative { {
      bes4. bes8 c, bes |
    } {
      bes'4. ~ bes4
    } } \bar "|."
  }

  \new ChordNames {
    \chordmode {
      s8 |
      bes4. bes/f | bes bes/d | c:m7/ees g:7/d | c:m c:7/e |
      f4.:7 f:7/c | f f:7/a | bes g:7/b | f f:7/a |

      bes4. bes/f | bes bes/d | c:m/ees g:7/d | c:m c:7/e |
      f4.:7 f:7/c | f:7 f:7/a | c:m f:7 | bes s8 c4:7 |

      f4. f/c | f2. | bes | bes/d |
      c4.:m/ees e:dim | bes/d g:7 | c:m7 f:7 | bes c:7 | bes
    }
  }
>>

  {

      b8 c des g, b g' |
      c,4 c8 bes aes g |
      \bar "||" \break
    } {
      c8 des c c des e |
      f4. f4 ees8 |
      \bar "||" \break
    } }

    des8 f f bes, f' f |
    c8 f f aes, f' f |
    c8 des c g aes bes |
    c4. c4 f8 |
    \break

    des8 f f bes, f' f |
    c8 f f aes, f' f |

    c,4 c8 bes aes g |
    \bar "||" \break

    aes8 c c f, c' c |
    bes8 c c g c c |
    c8 des c c e g |
    f4. f4 ees8 |
    \break

    des8 f f bes, c des |
    c8 f f aes, bes c |
    c8 des c c des e |
    f4. f4
    \bar "|."
   }

  \new ChordNames {
    \chordmode {
      s8 |
      f2.:m | c4.:7/g c:7/e | c:7 c:7/e | f:m f:m/aes |
      bes4.:m bes:m/g | f:m/aes f:m | g g/b | c:7 c:7/e |

      f2.:m | c4.:7/g c:7/e | c:7 c:7/e | f:m f:m/aes |
      bes4.:m bes:m/g | f:m/aes f:m | c2.:7 | f:m |

      bes2.:m | f4.:m/aes f:m | | c2. | f4.:m f/a |
      bes4.:m g:dim | f:m/aes f:m | g g:7 | c c:7 |

>>

miss-vg-s-strathspey.content:
\relative f'' <<
  {
    \clef treble
    \key a \major
    \time 4/4

    \repeat volta 2 {
      cis16 e8. e cis16 b8. a16 fis a8. |
      e8. gis16 a b8. cis4 cis |
      cis16 e8. e cis16 fis8. e16 d cis8. |
      b16 e,8. e gis16 a8 b cis d |
      \break

      cis16 e8. e cis16 b8. a16 fis a8. |
      e8. gis16 a b8. cis4 \tuplet 3/2 { cis8 d cis } |
      b16 fis'8. fis e16 \tuplet 3/2 { d8 e d } cis8. b16 |
      cis16 e,8. e16 fis8. a4 a8 gis |
      \bar "||" \break

      fis16 a8. a b16 cis b a gis fis8 e |
      fis16 a8. a b16 cis4 cis |
      e,16 gis8. gis a16 b a gis fis e8 d |
      e16 gis8. gis a16 \tuplet 3/2 { b4 a gis } |
      \break

      fis16 a8. a b16 cis b a gis fis8 e |
      fis16 a8. a b16 cis4 \tuplet 3/2 { cis8 d cis } |
      b16 fis'8. fis e16 \tuplet 3/2 { d8 e d } cis8. b16 |
      cis16 e,8. e16 fis8. a4 a |
    }

  \new ChordNames {

      a2 e4:7/gis d/fis | e2:7 a | a d | e e:7 |

      fis1:m | s | e:7 | s |

niols-s-farewell-to-the-east-fjords.name: Niols's Farewell to the East Fjords
niols-s-farewell-to-the-east-fjords.author: Nicolas “Niols” Jeannerod
niols-s-farewell-to-the-east-fjords.content:
\relative f' <<
  \new Voice {
    \clef treble
    \time 4/4

    \key f \major

    \partial 4 c4 |
    c'4 a bes c8 d |
    c4. a8 f2 |
    g4 bes8 g e4 d8 e |
    c2. c4 |
    \break

    c'4 a bes c8 d |
    c4. a8 f4 \tuplet 3/2 { e8 f e } |
    d4 bes' g e8 a |
    f2.
    \bar "||" \break

    c4 |
    c'4 a bes c8 d |
    c4. a8 f2 |
    d4 g8 c bes4 a |
    g2. c,4 |
    \break

    c'4 a bes c8 d |
    c4. a8 f4 e |
    d4 bes'8 g c,4 e |
    f2.
    \bar "||" \break

    \key f \minor

    c4 |
    aes'4. f8 bes8. aes16 g8 f |
    aes4 f c c |
    aes'4 g8 aes bes4 \tuplet 3/2 { g8 aes bes } |
    c4 bes8 aes g4 c, |
    \break

    aes'4. f8 bes8. aes16 g8 f |
    aes4 f c2 |
    e4 f8 g aes8. f16 c8 aes' |
    g8. e16 c8 g' f4
    \bar "||" \break

    \key f \major

    c4 |
    c'4 a bes c8 d |
    c4. a8 f2 |
